name: (Variant One)Test Play
description: Methodyca, a point and click adventure game, where a student is charged with seeking out this missing supervisor who travelled through a portal into a parallel universe. The student embarks on an adventure in search of the missing supervisor and encounters interesting individuals on the search. These individuals are representations of scholars in the real world and the player is presented with mini-challenges and must succeed if help is required by the scholars. The challenges are majorly data collections methods includings but aren't limited to interviews, questionnaires, prototyping, designing and observations. The player must use knowledge and resources acquired from research methods taught in educational institutions to achieve the goal of the game.
